import React, { useState } from 'react'; const AddReview = () => { const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [rating, setRating] = useState("Rating"); const [reviewText, setReviewText] = useState(""); const handleSubmitReview = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); Resta } return (
setName(e.target.value)} id="name" placeholder="Name" type="text" className="form-control"/>
) } export default AddReview;
